name: Thunder Space Force Vs. The GigaBots
name_original: Thunder Space Force Vs. The GigaBots
description:
A Breakout/Arkanoid Game style. Based on Block Breaker game, part of the Unity Developer 2D course (2018 update), by "GameDev.tv by Ben Tristem".

-Sprites made by myself, using Gimp software.

-Audio from freesound.com artists and Bfxr software.

Gameplay:

-Move mouse left and right to move paddle;

-Press left button mouse to launch the ball;

-One hit to destroy pink blocks.

-Two hits to destroy cyan blocks.

- Three hits to destroy the blocks with de eyes.

-Grey/White blocks cannot be destroyed!!

-Win by destroing all blocks, or just the ones with the eyes.

-For now there´s only 5 levels. Level layout could be changed during the game development.

Show your suggestions and/or opinions about game visual, layout, mechanics, sounds, bugs...

The game will keep growing as i improve my game developer abilities.

Next improvements:

-Power-ups!
